mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profilepicture values( (SELECT NVL(MAX(p_no) + 1, 10000001) FROM profilepicture), #{oname}, #{sname}, #{dir}, #{len}, sysdate )

SELECT NVL(MAX(a_no) + 1, 100000000001) FROM albumpicture
INSERT INTO albumpicture values( #{no}, #{oname}, #{sname}, #{dir}, #{len}, sysdate )
